name: Starsnake: Hololive & Holostars Fan Game
description:
As soon as Noir Vesper identified himself as a boomer who remembered old phones, I knew a certain fan game had to be created, as I suspect snake may be a nostalgic title.

A timeless classic, resurrected in a Hololive theme. Featuring time-honored gameplay, all the characters of the Hololive/Holostars English branches, a plethora of themed cosmetics and levels to collect and unlock... and unlock how? Through gacha, of course, because why not. In Hololive fangames, it's what we do.

Available now, for free, of course.

If you like what you see, this was just a small side project, so keep an eye out, as I do have something more substantial coming out sometime in the near future. Thanks for your time and enjoy this little bit of old school fun.
